Technics 3010 Foldable Propeller Set

India-manufactured propellers for commercial and agriculture drones. Compatible with Hobbywing X8 3090/3011 and T-Motor P80 MF3016. Lightweight, reliable, and precision-balanced for diverse UAV applications.
